author: Brian Lloyd
title: Man-Cave | Watch: The new Sminky Shorts episode on Argentina V Ireland is fantastic
text:
After last week's fantastic episode, we just knew Sminky Animation would be back with another one.
And sure, they delivered - this time, pitting the Buffalos against... an Argentine Puma?
The injured Buffalos, as well, kinda makes it too real for us. Sniff.
ARA WE'LL BATE THEM TO F*CK!
Via YouTube
MORE: Watch: Sminky Shorts is back with an episode about tomorrow's rugby game against France
